result.arabic_text: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَۖ ثُمَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ يَعۡدِلُونَ
result.translation: 1. Fayla inkih lem Qaranwaa kee Baaxo gineeh diteetaa kee diifu hee Yalla kinni, tohuk lakal Yallih inkittinaanee kee kay dudda tascassee astootiy maqarleeh Baxxaqqa itta abaluk koros sinni Rabbit agleytit haytaah kaat massossa qibaadal.
